name: Vampire Cross
description:
Online, you can do local by opening the game twice and choosing host then join.
For online you will need to know how to port forward, sorry!

Hunter/Host:
WASD/ZQSD to move, you attack automatically.
Goal: Find and destroy all 3 towers!

Lord/Client:
WASD/ZQSD to move, scroll wheel to zoom in and out.
Left click to set down a spell, Q/E or A/E to switch between them.
Goal: Kill the hunter!
